diff_act: 2.ensure they are in a valid state before execution
3.verify device sensors are within specified safety parameters

regen.absent_element: action to handle invalid status of device sensors
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide an alert or notification when a device sensor has an invalid status, preventing command execution.

regen.absent_element: specification for handling invalid or bad status of device sensors
regen.new_specification: The system shall handle and provide an appropriate response when a device sensor has an invalid or bad status, including notification and potential shutdown or adjustment of affected systems.

regen.absent_element: specification for handling invalid device sensor status
regen.new_specification: The system shall handle and record device sensors with an invalid status, preventing command execution until all device sensors report a valid status.

label: The system shall abort the device if the status is unknown.
absence: situation of the device status is unknown
